arts.ttl: Sunday's Transfer Talk Update: Lamine Yamal, Pedri, Casemiro
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest confirmed transfer news and speculation from across the footballing world.

arts.ttl: Kounde must hang his head in shame as Barca throw it away
arts.sum: With 10 minutes left of the game against Celta Vigo at Balaidos, Barcelona were 2-0 up and cruising . It was another timely wake up call for Hansi Flick and Barcelona on a night when the focus was initially on the frankly awful Gerard Martin, who was only in the starting XI due to the absence of Alejandro Balde on the left side of defence .

arts.ttl: Javier Mascherano claimed Lionel Messi could have been a defender as Barcelona icons to reunite
arts.sum: Javier Mascherano is set to be appointed as the new head coach of Inter Miami following Gerardo 'Tata' Martino's shock departure and has previously spoken about Lionel Messi's defensive qualities

arts.ttl: ‘We played a very bad game’ - Flick blasts Barca after Celta draw
arts.sum: However, a red card for Marc Casado changed the game late on, while a Jules Kounde mistake allowed Celta to halve the deficit. The least bad thing is that it’s only one match and we got a point but we’re not happy and neither are the players.

arts.ttl: Flick slams 'really bad' Barça after letting lead slip
arts.sum: Barcelona coach Hansi Flick was hugely critical of his team's performance after the LaLiga leaders blew a two-goal lead to draw 2-2 with Celta Vigo at Balaídos on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Gavi blasts ‘stupid’ Barcelona after Celta Vigo draw
arts.sum: Gavi made his first start in a year at Balaidos and had his team on course for a 2-0 win until a late collapse saw Hansi Flick’s side forced to settle for a point. Barcelona midfielder Gavi couldn’t hide his frustration after seeing his team throw away a two-goal lead to draw 2-2 at Celta on Saturday .

arts.ttl: ‘We drew because of me’ - Kounde takes blame after Barca held
arts.sum: Kounde conceded afterwards he made a mistake and says the team need to get back on track after two games without a win in La Liga. Starting with me, I didn’t play a good game.

arts.ttl: Arteta 'in love' with Arsenal target, Amorim eyes PSG star for Man Utd, Barcelona stunned: FT Recap
arts.sum: Arteta 'in love' with Arsenal target, Amorim eyes PSG star for Man Utd, Barcelona stunned: FT Recap Man Utd target January midfield transfer despite Amorim 'love' for forgotten star

arts.ttl: Jules Kounde accepts blame as Barcelona slip at Celta Vigo
arts.sum: Barcelona star Jules Kounde fronted up over his mistake in their 2-2 La Liga draw at Celta Vigo. The Catalans missed the chance to extend their lead at the top of the table as they gave up a two-goal lead in the final five minutes in Vigo. Despite looking certain to edge over the line […] The post Jules Kounde accepts blame as Barcelona slip at Celta Vigo appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: ‘My fault’ – Barcelona star responds to his costly individual mistake in Celta Vigo draw
arts.sum: Barcelona star Jules Koundé has late tonight spoken out on his costly error, en route to the club’s stalemate with Celta Vigo. This comes amid a heavy backlash being directed…
